Class BackPack

java.lang.Object
fr.uge.backpackhero.item.BackPack
public class BackPack extends Object
Represents the hero's backpack grid containing placed items.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    BackPack()
    Creates the default starting backpack (3 rows × 5 columns).
    BackPack(int row, int column)
    Creates a backpack of the given size.

  • Constructor Details

    • BackPack

      public BackPack(int row, int column)
      Creates a backpack of the given size.
      Parameters:
      row - number of rows
      column - number of columns

    • BackPack

      public BackPack()
      Creates the default starting backpack (3 rows × 5 columns).

  • Method Details

    • addGold

      public void addGold(int amount)
      Adds gold to the hero's wallet.
      Parameters:
      amount - non-negative gold amount
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if amount < 0

    • spendGold

      public boolean spendGold(int amount)
      Attempts to spend gold.
      Parameters:
      amount - positive amount of gold to spend
      Returns:
      true if the hero had enough gold, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if amount <= 0

    • getGoldQuantity

      public int getGoldQuantity()
      Returns:
      the current gold amount.

    • add

      public boolean add(ItemInstance itemInstance, Position startPos)
      Adds an ItemInstance to the backpack at the given position.
      Parameters:
      itemInstance - the instance to add
      startPos - anchor position
      Returns:
      true if successfully added, false otherwise

    • removeItem

      public boolean removeItem(ItemInstance itemInstance)
      Removes an ItemInstance from the backpack and clears its tiles.
      Parameters:
      itemInstance - item to remove
      Returns:
      true if it was removed, false otherwise

    • getItemAt

      public Optional<ItemInstance> getItemAt(Position pos)
      Returns the item present at the given position.
      Parameters:
      pos - position in the grid
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the item instance or empty if none

    • getItems

      public List<ItemInstance> getItems()
      Returns:
      all items currently in the backpack.

    • expand

      public void expand(int extraColumns)
      Expands the backpack by adding columns.
      Parameters:
      extraColumns - number of additional columns

    • getRows

      public int getRows()

    • getColumns

      public int getColumns()
